name: uncastrated
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An uncastrated man or male animal has not had its testicles (= the two round male sex organs) removed: A stallion is any uncastrated male horse that is one year of age or older.
More examplesFewer examplesBoth females and uncastrated males were used in the trials. We conclude from the study that uncastrated males roam over the largest area. The local dish is made of the flesh and offal of uncastrated boars.Physical castration does not otherwise affect the lifespan of men compared to uncastrated men.
